user_query: I'm planning a family reunion in a new city, and I need some help finding a suitable venue for the event. Can you provide me with a list of venues along with their open orders? Additionally, recommend a vegetarian restaurant in the area for a family dinner.

TaskList.description: Search for available venues in the specified city for family reunions.
Retrieve open orders for each of the identified venues.
Find vegetarian restaurant recommendations in the same city.
